department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Canadian Armed Forces have a requirement to get PGME from medical schools across Canada.
description: The contract is for a standing offer that will last for 5 years and will cover the requirement of medical officers and medical specialists to get PGME from medical schools across Canada. The Contract will cover various medical units across different regions in Canada.
full_summary:
***

**Title: Postgraduate Medical Education Services**
==============================================

**Record Number:** WS3596272785

**Publication Date:** August 31, 2022

**Closing Date:** March 2, 2023 (14:00 EST)

**Selection Method: Competitive - Open Bidding**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for Postgraduate Medical Education (PGME) services with an unrestricted provincial or territorial license from Canadian Medical Schools across Canada. The services are required for Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members to support international and domestic operations and provide clinical care to CAF members throughout Canada.

**Background**
------------

The CAF requires Medical Officers and Medical Specialists to fulfill its medical needs. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Canadian services only are eligible for this requirement.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

* The period of the Standing Offer (SO) will be up to 5 years from the date of SO issuance.
* Multiple Standing Offers are anticipated.
* The services are subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The requirement is limited to Canadian services, with no security requirements.

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

Bidders must submit their bid and all required supporting documentation by 14:00 EST on March 2, 2023. All bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

**Point of Contact**
-------------------

For more information, please contact:
Heather Cole (SPAC/PSPC)
heather.cole@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Ariba Discovery URL**
-----------------------
